code: import"./careersearch.css";import gsap from"gsap";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CareerSearch(){var mouse={x:0,y:0};document.addEventListener("mousemove",function(e){mouse.x=e.clientX||e.pageX;mouse.y=e.clientY||e.pageY;var posX=parseInt(mouse.x-window.innerWidth/2);var posY=parseInt(mouse.y-window.innerHeight/2);gsap.to(".text",0,{textShadow:posX/-150+"px "+posY/-100+"px 2px #FE637F"});},false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text",children:"and i am looking for the next step in my career path"})});}export default CareerSearch;
